English.Text: The thieves passed through these hills only recently. Weaving between the lagoons, reading prints, snapped twigs and all the rest, your hunting party finally spies the distant trio of varmints scaling a barren incline towards a farmstead. "We've got 'em now!" they say, but arriving at the isolated ranch, the rancher has bad news. "They gone stole my horses!" Seems there's no hope of catching them on foot. "I 'preciate you trying to catch those sinners, but I can't let any more of these here beauties go for free! Unless you want to try an' buck a wild one..."
